subcategory.name: Checkout Pages
subcategory.description: Ecommerce checkout page examples for Tailwind CSS, designed and built by the creators of the framework.
subcategory.introduction: Use these Tailwind CSS checkout page examples to streamline the payment process and guide customers through entering shipping details, payment information, and reviewing their order before completing their purchase. These page examples are designed and built by the Tailwind CSS team, and include a variety of different styles and layouts.
